SOUNDBOARD.log.invalidSound: is not a valid audio file, skipping
SOUNDBOARD.settings.hint.directory: This should point to a folder containing subfolders, each containing audio files. See modules/SoundBoard/exampleAudio/ for an example
SOUNDBOARD.settings.hint.bundled: Use the bundled SoundBoard library. You can also set your own library above, and SoundBoard will use both
SOUNDBOARD.app.title: My Sounds - SoundBoard by Blitz
SOUNDBOARD.app.instructions: Left click a sound button to broadcast it to all players, right click a sound to preview a sound for the GM only. Click a category name to collapse or expand it.
SOUNDBOARD.app.instructionsExtended: Click 'Stop All' to end all currently playing sounds
SOUNDBOARD.notif.soundsNotLoaded: Sounds are still loading, please try again shortly
SOUNDBOARD.notif.soundsError: Error loading sounds. Check your path in module settings
